title: Authors and Citation

code: @Manual{,   title = {gformexperiment: R toolkit for Google Forms experiment},   author = {Gento Kato},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.0.1.004},   url = {https://gentok.github.io/gformexperiment/}, }

what: R toolkit for Google Forms experiment
title: R toolkit for Google Forms experiment
R toolkit for Google Forms experiment
text: Generate HTML file randomize prefilled answers Google Forms, generate codebook JSON output, import recode Google Forms responses data file. package website published .

title: R toolkit for Google Forms experiment
R toolkit for Google Forms experiment
text: genstartpage Generate experiment start page (HTML). gensimplecodebook Generate (export) simplified codebook. read_gform Import Google Form survey data using JSON survey information. bindquestions Combine multiple variables.

title: R toolkit for Google Forms experiment
R toolkit for Google Forms experiment
text: 2025/01/21 Version 0.0.1.004 Bug fixes read_gform() 2025/01/06 Version 0.0.1.003 Bug fixes gencodebook() 2024/11/25 Version 0.0.1.002 Updates genstartpage read_gform() 2024/11/20 Version 0.0.1.001 released

title: Combine multiple variables — bindquestions
code: bindquestions(   data,   vnames,   keep_var_label = FALSE,   keep_val_labels = TRUE,   reversed_loc = NULL,   val_lim = NULL )

title: Combine multiple variables — bindquestions
text: data data.frame object vnames character vector variable names combine. keep_var_label Boolean indicate whether keep variable label (first variable vnames) . keep_val_labels Boolean indicate whether keep value labels (first variable vnames) . reversed_loc Integer vector indicate location variables reversed vnames. val_lim Integer vector length 2 indicates limits values (used reversed_loc NULL.)

title: Generate full-information codebook dataset — gencodebook
code: gencodebook(   survey_json,   DKtext = "わからない",   DKcode = 888,   NAtext = "答えたくない",   NAcode = 999,   text_randomize = NULL,   text_starttime = NULL )

title: Generate full-information codebook dataset — gencodebook
text: survey_json Name JSON survey file exported gformexperiment custom add-. DKtext Raw full text(s) response option(s) indicate "know" answers. DKcode Response code "know" answers. NAtext Raw full text(s) response option(s) indicate refused answers. NAcode Response code refused answers. text_randomize Raw full text(s) question(s) used randomize experimental conditions. text_starttime Raw full text question used record starting time.

title: Generate (and export) simplified codebook — gensimplecodebook
code: gensimplecodebook(   survey_json,   DKtext = "わからない",   DKcode = 888,   NAtext = "答えたくない",   NAcode = 999,   OtherOptiontext = "その他",   OtherOptioncode = 666,   includeTimeStamp = TRUE,   includeEmail = FALSE,   text_randomize = NULL,   text_starttime = NULL,   show_duration = TRUE,   textout = NULL,   csvout = NULL )

title: Generate (and export) simplified codebook — gensimplecodebook
text: survey_json Name JSON survey file exported gformexperiment custom add-. DKtext Raw full text(s) response option(s) indicate "know" answers. DKcode Response code "know" answers. NAtext Raw full text(s) response option(s) indicate refused answers. NAcode Response code refused answers. OtherOptiontext Texts codebook indicate "" answers. OtherOptioncode Response code "" answers. includeTimeStamp Boolean indicate whether include system-generated timestamp variable codebook . includeEmail Boolean indicate whether include system-generated email variable codebook . text_randomize Raw full text(s) question(s) used randomize experimental conditions. text_starttime Raw full text question used record starting time. show_duration Boolean indicate whether include duration variable codebook (text_starttime available). textout Name path output html file saved. csvout Name path output csv file saved.

title: Generate experiment start page (HTML) — genstartpage
code: genstartpage(   survey_json,   text_randomize,   text_starttime = NULL,   weights_randomize = NULL,   timeZone = "survey_json timeZone",   file = NULL )

title: Generate experiment start page (HTML) — genstartpage
text: survey_json Name JSON survey file exported gformexperiment custom add-. text_randomize Raw full text(s) question(s) used randomize experimental conditions. text_starttime Raw full text question used record starting time. weights_randomize Numeric vector list numeric vectors indicating randomization weights. List length must equal number randomization questions. Length list element must equal number experimental conditions. timeZone Timezone record starting time. default set time zone one set survey_json. file Name path output html file saved.

what: Import Google Form survey CSV Data using JSON file information — read_gform
title: Import Google Form survey CSV Data using JSON file information — read_gform
text: Import Google Form survey CSV Data using JSON file information

title: Import Google Form survey CSV Data using JSON file information — read_gform
code: read_gform(   responses_data,   survey_json,   DKtext = "わからない",   DKcode = 888,   NAtext = "答えたくない",   NAcode = 999,   OtherOptiontext = "その他",   OtherOptioncode = 666,   text_randomize = NULL,   text_starttime = NULL,   includeTimeStamp = TRUE,   show_duration = TRUE,   includeEmail = FALSE,   survey_csv = NULL,   ... )

title: Import Google Form survey CSV Data using JSON file information — read_gform
text: responses_data Name either one (1) JSON responses file exported gformexperiment custom add-(2) CSV survey response file exported using Google Sheets output. survey_json Name JSON survey file exported gformexperiment custom add-. DKtext Raw full text(s) response option(s) indicate "know" answers. DKcode Response code "know" answers. NAtext Raw full text(s) response option(s) indicate refused answers. NAcode Response code refused answers. OtherOptiontext Texts codebook indicate "" answers. OtherOptioncode Response code "" answers. text_randomize Raw full text(s) question(s) used randomize experimental conditions. text_starttime Raw full text question used record starting time. includeTimeStamp Boolean indicate whether include system-generated timestamp variable codebook . show_duration Boolean indicate whether include duration variable codebook (text_starttime available). includeEmail Boolean indicate whether include system-generated email variable codebook . survey_csv (deprecated) import responses data CSV file (incorporated responses_data). ... Optional argumens passed read.csv() function.
